Action.Description: This trigger is not triggered directly (event source = none). It is triggered by the "Delayer" trigger so that we can have sufficient delay while still having a mutex.
0 = north, +1 = 90 degrees right. e.g. right cleave, facing S = 1 (right) + 2 (south) = 3 (cleaving west)

Trigger.Name: Cataclysm
Trigger.Description:
This trigger calls out Prismatic Deception safe spots when the casts of Blasting Zone start on the enemy list. The calls by default are North, Northeast, East, Southeast, obviously the cardinal/intercardinal direction opposite of what the trigger calls will be safe too. If you prefer, you can change the things the TTS actions call in the Trigger Actions tab of the this trigger.
Version History: v1.4: Public Release v1.5: Rewrote part of this trigger to have fewer moving parts since it wasn't executing consistently v1.6: I swear to god this thing works now
